name: Quick2LAUNCH
tag_list: presentations, pitch, slide-deck, investor-pitch, powerpoint, launchdeck
overview:
Quick2LAUNCH eliminates the cost and time required to create powerful visuals in any presentation. Our platform, ConceptDrop, is an engine for transforming a presentation into a winning, graphically enhanced pitch. ConceptDrop starts with customers dropping off skeletons, notes, or basic outlines of presentations. After quickly filling out a creative brief and setting a deadline, customers can return to our platform and download a presentation updated and enhanced by professional designers. All presentations are secured and protected on the ConceptDrop platform. Corporations can share, update, and download presentations based upon a user hierarchy created in our system.

We leverage partnerships to create a cost structure that yields competitive pricing and rapid turnaround for our customers. Our designers are available 24/7 and can be accessed directly through ConceptDrop. We have access to more than 150 graphic designers who have completed work for Fortune 500 firms and small businesses around the globe.
